hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user account of an smtp service (default gmail) to use for sending mail

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EMAIL_FROM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name that should be displayed as the outbound account. If not supplied, this is the same as the email address provided.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER_PASSWORD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Password for the gmail account used to send mail

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: sed -i -E 's#<mail-session name="([^"]*?)" from="([^"]*?)" jndi-name="([^"]*?)" debug="([^"]*?)">#<mail-session name="\1" from="'"$EMAIL_FROM"'" jndi-name="\3" debug="\4">#g' /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml sed -i -E 's#<smtp-server outbound-socket-binding-ref="([^"]*?)" tls="([^"]*?)" username="([^"]*?)" password="([^"]*?)" />#<smtp-server outbound-socket-binding-ref="\1" tls="\2" username="'"$USER"'" password="'"$PASSWORD"'" />#g' /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml
